pages.text: The $(d)Golden Compass$() can be linked to a specific location, and $(3)aims towards it$().$(br2)Of course, it only works if you're in the same dimension as the location.$(br2)Is this functionally identical to simply using a Lodestone? Maybe!
pages.title: Golden Compass

pages.text: To link the Compass to a location, craft it together with a set $(l:items/location_filter)Location Filter$(/l).$(br2)There are some other ways as well, such as using it on a $(l:blocks/biome_radar)Biome Radar$(/l) to link it to the located biome.
